content.query:
SELECT 
    SUM(Free) AS Free_Total,
    SUM(XS) AS XS_Total,
    SUM(S) AS S_Total,
    SUM(M) AS M_Total,
    SUM(L) AS L_Total,
    SUM(XL) AS XL_Total,
    SUM(XXL) AS XXL_Total,
    SUM("3XL") AS "3XL_Total",
    SUM("4XL") AS "4XL_Total",
    SUM("5XL") AS "5XL_Total",
    SUM("6XL") AS "6XL_Total"
FROM size_sales_quantity;
